name: GOLDACHE
description:
The tomb was long thought to be only a rumor.

So were the curses.

Venture into the unknown depths in search of Big Treasure. Collect coins along the way to pay for your resurrection after your (many, many) deaths. Try to escape with your life and enough treasure to satisfy your goldache.

Arrow keys to move. Z/C to jump, X/V to unlock doors if you have a key. Made in PICO-8.
